title: Goat's cheese toasts
ingredients: ['1 baguette, about 280 g (10 oz), cut into 2.5 cm (1 in) slices', '4 tbsp passata', '2 tbsp sun-dried tomato paste', '4 plum tomatoes, about 250 g (8½ oz) in total', "140 g (5 oz) goat's cheese", '11/2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '15 g (½ oz) pine nuts', 'few sprigs of fresh thyme or oregano, plus extra to garnish']
